citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:15-3:45PM on
February 28th, 2022. USDA personnel called, texted, emailed, and knocked on the door.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:15-3:45PM on 
February 28th, 2022. USDA personnel called, texted, emailed, and knocked on the door. 
 
 
 
End Section
